original_text: This is what the Lord says: “I will return to Zion and dwell in Jerusalem. Then Jerusalem will be called the Faithful City, and the mountain of the Lord Almighty will be called the Holy Mountain.”
korean_text: 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 내가 시온에 돌아와 예루살렘 가운데에 거하리니 예루살렘은 진리의 성읍이라 일컫겠고 만군의 여호와의 산은 성산이라 일컫게 되리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
Then Jerusalem will be called the Faithful City,
and the mountain of the Lord Almighty
will be called the Holy Mountain.
